byline.original: By JAMES MacDONALD Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES.British Combine

snippet: SOUTHAMPTON, England, Dec. 1--This town looked tonight somewhat like Coventry when the Ger  man raiders passed after they had tried in the space of one frightful night to raze that industrial city....

headline.main: SOUTHAMPTON DIGS IN RUINS FOR DEAD; Parts of Port City Look Like Coventry After Its Worst Night of Nazi Bombing HOME AREAS HARDEST HIT Churches, Hospitals and Trade Centers Struck--Evacuation at Night Is Urged Left Many Homeless Several Churches Hit

lead_paragraph: SOUTHAMPTON, England, Dec. 1--This town looked tonight somewhat like Coventry when the Ger man raiders passed after they had tried in the space of one frightful night to raze that industrial city.
